attributes.action: Making the GCSE science exams half an hour shorter.
attributes.background: The GCSE science exams including Chemistry, Physics and  Biology are much to long and strenuous. Half an Hour shorter and it would make a lot of difference in the results as the students would not need to revise as much on this subject but on all subjects.

rejection.details: The length of exams is the responsibility of exam boards, not the UK Government or Parliament.
